basics.name: Jasmeet Oberai
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer graduated from the University of Waterloo looking for experience in the vast field of Computer Software. •  Agile and iterative, I love to test and I love to script • I also have strong teamwork skills along with excellent analytical, organizational and communication skills

highlights: Implemented many core analytics engine features, optimizations and improvements
Added batch processing interface and backtesting support for Jupyter frontend using ComDB2 and RabbitMQ
Assisted in setting up horizotal scalability service for distributed processing of queries using Java and Spark
Expanded CI/CD infrastructure using Python, jMeter and Jenkins
School captain for hiring at University of Waterloo
Tools/Frameworks Used: Java, Spark, Spring, Python, C++, RabbitMQ, ComDB2, Bash
